title: The Future of Ethical Hacking
excerpt: Exploring the next generation of security tools and mindset in an AI-driven world.
content:
Ethical hacking is evolving. In a world where AI is becoming the norm, security professionals must adapt. The tools are getting smarter, but so are the attackers.

1. AI-Powered Reconnaissance

Traditional scanning is being replaced by intelligent discovery tools that can predict vulnerabilities before they are even exposed.

2. Automation in Remediation

The gap between detection and patching is closing. Automated systems can now detect and neutralize threats in real-time.

Conclusion: The mindset of an ethical hacker remains their most valuable toolâ€”curiosity, persistence, and strategic thinking.

title: Mastering React Performance
excerpt: Deep dive into memoization, virtualization, and advanced optimization techniques.
content:
React is fast by default, but complex applications can slow down without proper care. Optimization is an iterative process.

UseMemo vs UseCallback

Understanding when to cache calculations versus when to cache function references is critical for preventing unnecessary re-renders.

Virtualization

For large lists, only rendering what is visible can drastically improve frame rates and memory usage.

title: Unreal Engine 5: Beyond Games
excerpt: How real-time rendering is transforming architectural visualization and film production.
content:
Lumen and Nanite have changed the game, but not just for players. Hollywood and architects are taking notice.
